structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Precedence of condemnation cases in courts.
law.text: Court proceedings necessary to acquire property or property rights for purposes of KRS 177.220 to 177.310 shall take precedence over all other causes not involving the public interest in all courts, to the end that the provision of limited access facilities may be expedited.
